comments: Known by his friends as 'Tom' Plocek
examples: Alchemilla stenoleuca A. Plocek in Folia Geobot. Phytotax., 28(4): 403 (1990  publ. 1991).
source: Year of birth and corrections to spelling sent by M. Kovanda in letter of 9  February 1998; Death year from Jiří Danihelka (BRNU). Obit. in Zprávy České Bot. Spolećn. , 46(2): 387-388 (2011) incl. bibliogr. (Name as 'Alexander')
